caption:
The photograph features a close-up of a single iris flower, predominantly in shades of lavender and purple. The flower's petals are delicately textured, showcasing intricate lines and patterns that give a sense of depth and fragile beauty. The iris is captured with its three large outer petals spread gracefully apart, while the smaller, upright inner structures are visible, detailed with a slight yellow and white coloring at the base.

The background is deep green, softly blurred with hints of other foliage, contributing to a rich, contrasted backdrop that emphasizes the delicate purple hues of the iris. The lighting is subtle, suggesting natural ambient light that enhances the botanical textures and colors, giving the flower a vibrant yet serene appearance. This focus on the iris against a soft natural environment spotlights the flower's elegant structure and the intricate details of its petals.
title: Blue flag (iris), in the Adirondack Forest Preserve
